# changes in this file.

add_subdirectory(ut)

add_library(vdisk-hulldb-compstrat)


target_link_libraries(vdisk-hulldb-compstrat PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  vdisk-hulldb-base
  vdisk-hulldb-generic
  ydb-core-protos
)
